name: time_metrics
description: Aggregates key campaign performance metrics from `stg_campaigns` on a monthly basis. This model provides a high-level overview of campaign effectiveness trends over time.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The calendar month (1-12) for which the metrics are aggregated. Extracted from the campaign date in stg_campaigns.

columns.name: campaign_count
columns.description: The total number of distinct campaigns active during the month.

columns.name: avg_conversion_rate
columns.description: The average conversion rate across all campaigns active during the month. Represents the average efficiency of campaigns in achieving their conversion goals.

columns.name: avg_roi
columns.description: The average Return on Investment (ROI) across all campaigns active during the month. Indicates the average profitability of campaigns.

columns.name: avg_acquisition_cost
columns.description: The average cost to acquire a customer (CAC) or desired outcome across all campaigns active during the month.

columns.name: total_clicks
columns.description: The total number of clicks generated by all campaigns during the month.

columns.name: total_impressions
columns.description: The total number of impressions served by all campaigns during the month.

columns.name: overall_ctr
columns.description: The overall Click-Through Rate (CTR) for the month, calculated as (Total Clicks / Total Impressions). Measures the overall effectiveness of ad creatives and targeting in generating clicks.
